content: I've recently been experiencing issues where x.py (correctly) stops because another x.py process is running and holds a build directory lock, but when I stop the other process, I have to manually rm build/lock.db* and restart the build for it to notice it can acquire the lock. Is anyone else having this issue?
The two concurrent commands here are r-a running x.py check and me running x.py test.
I've also just been having issues where r-a hangs while running x.py check recently.
